post:
What's better than 25% folks?  30%!

All plans are 30% off for the life of your account, even if you need to upgrade!  Use code LEB30


Front Range Hosting is a VPS hosting company based in Colorado Springs Colorado
Our VPS Servers are Supermicro Built with Xeon E5 Series Processors
Our VPS Servers utilize LSI CacheCade SSD Acceleration, disk space with the speed of SSD's!
Our network, power, and HVAC is fully redundant, and our servers are hosted in a secure datacenter in Downtown Colorado Springs Colorado



Pricing on 4 plans below are inclusive of the LEB30 code.

Memory Format is as follows:  Dedicated/Burst/vSwap

**REMEMBER! Prices are discounted after you click "Add to Cart"**

128M/256M/128M 5G Disk 250G Xfer 1.40/mo [Direct Code Link!](https://www.frontrangehosting.com/wh/cart.php?a=add&pid=16&promocode=LEB25)

256M/512M/256M 10G Disk 500G Xfer 2.80/mo With Code LEB25  [Direct Code Link!](https://www.frontrangehosting.com/wh/cart.php?a=add&pid=18&promocode=LEB30)

384M/768M/384M 15G Disk 750G Xfer 4.20/mo With Code LEB25 [Direct Code Link!](https://www.frontrangehosting.com/wh/cart.php?a=add&pid=34&promocode=LEB30)

512M/1024M/512M 20G Disk 1TB Xfer 5.60/mo With Code LEB25 [Direct Code Link!](https://www.frontrangehosting.com/wh/cart.php?a=add&pid=19&promocode=LEB30)

Limited Time Only Get the 1024/2048/1024 Plan for 7.00 Use Code LEB1024 [Direct Code Link!](https://www.frontrangehosting.com/wh/cart.php?a=add&pid=22&promocode=LEB1024)

[Larger Plans Available](http://www.frontrangehosting.com/vps.php) All plans are 30% off with LEB30 and you can upgrade anytime and keep your discount!

Features
24x7x365.25 Support, were even here for leap seconds!

EV SSL Protected Shopping Cart, Accept Credit Cards, Paypal, and 2 Checkout
